ui_home_welcome_message: Start your journey to mastering A2 level Dutch with our comprehensive lessons, grammar explanations, and practice exercises.
ui_home_feature_1: Structured lessons specifically designed for A2 level.
ui_home_feature_2: Detailed grammar explanations with clear examples.
ui_home_feature_3: A wide variety of interactive exercises and quizzes.
ui_home_feature_4: User interface available in English, Dutch, and Tagalog (learning content is in Dutch).
ui_lessons_page_intro: Browse through our A2 level Dutch lessons, grouped by difficulty.
ui_grammar_page_intro: Explore various Dutch grammar topics, grouped by difficulty.
ui_no_lessons_match_filter: No lessons match your current filters.
